articles.title: Apple users targeted by 'mysterious' malware - BBC News
articles.description: Devices in more than 150 countries are infected - but researchers still do not know why.
articles.content:
image captionThe malware has targeted Apple devices with M1 chips
About 30,000 Mac devices have been infected with a mysterious piece of malware.
The "unusual" Silver Sparrow strain silently affect… [+1830 chars]

articles.title: Cheap M1 MacBooks Hit Apple’s Refurbished Store - Forbes

articles.content:
